targets.expr: ((visor_job_start_total{job="$job"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job"}

# DIsplay only if a watch is running
visor_watch_height{job="$job"}

# Filter running Jobs only
label_replace(visor_tipset_height{job="$job"} * on (exported_job) (((visor_job_start_total{job="$job"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job"}), "__name__", "Running Job", "","")

count(((visor_job_start_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"find_.*"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"find_.*"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"find_.*"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job", exported_job=~"find_.*"})

count(((visor_job_start_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"gap_.*"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"gap_.*"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"gap_.*"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job", exported_job=~"gap_.*"})

count(((visor_job_start_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"watch_.*"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"watch_.*"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"watch_.*"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job", exported_job=~"watch_.*"})

count(((visor_job_start_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"walk_.*"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"walk_.*"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job", exported_job=~"walk_.*"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job", exported_job=~"walk_.*"})

count(((visor_job_start_total{job="$job", exported_job!~"find_.*|gap_.*|watch_.*|walk_.*"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job", exported_job!~"find_.*|gap_.*|watch_.*|walk_.*"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job", exported_job!~"find_.*|gap_.*|watch_.*|walk_.*"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job", exported_job!~"find_.*|gap_.*|watch_.*|walk_.*"})

# Filter running Jobs only
label_replace(visor_tipset_height{job="$job"} * on (exported_job) group_left() (((visor_job_start_total{job="$job"} unless visor_job_complete_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_error_total{job="$job"}) unless visor_job_timeout{job="$job"}), "__name__", "Running Job", "","")

targets.rawSql:
-- Bug in Grafana  handling paranthesis in the $__unixEpochGroupAlias macro => usage of *1000/$__interval_ms #Commit https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/46764
SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(height*30*1000/$__interval_ms+1598306400,$__interval),
  (EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400)) + EXTRACT (SECOND FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400))/60) AS minutes
FROM visor_processing_reports
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(height*30+1598306400) and (status = 'OK' or status_information = 'NULL_ROUND')
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: All tipsets that have been observed by a job. Tipset can be completed/skipped or in error

targets.rawSql:
-- Bug in Grafana  handling paranthesis in the $__unixEpochGroupAlias macro => usage of *1000/$__interval_ms #Commit https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/46764
SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(height*30*1000/$__interval_ms+1598306400,$__interval),
  (EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400)) + EXTRACT (SECOND FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400))/60) AS minutes
FROM visor_processing_reports
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(height*30+1598306400)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Tipsets - OBSERVED

panels.description: All gap reported by gap report

targets.rawSql:
-- Bug in Grafana  handling paranthesis in the $__unixEpochGroupAlias macro => usage of *1000/$__interval_ms #Commit https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/46764
SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(height*30*1000/$__interval_ms+1598306400,$__interval),
  (EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM to_timestamp(visor_gap_reports.height*30+1598306400)) + EXTRACT (SECOND FROM to_timestamp(visor_gap_reports.height*30+1598306400))/60) AS minutes

FROM visor_gap_reports
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(height*30+1598306400)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Tipsets - GAP report

panels.description: All tipsets that have been skipped

targets.rawSql:
-- Bug in Grafana  handling paranthesis in the $__unixEpochGroupAlias macro => usage of *1000/$__interval_ms #Commit https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/46764
SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(height*30*1000/$__interval_ms+1598306400,$__interval),
  (EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400)) + EXTRACT (SECOND FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400))/60) AS minutes
FROM visor_processing_reports
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(height*30+1598306400) and (status = 'SKIP')
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Tipsets - SKIPPED

targets.rawSql:
-- Bug in Grafana  handling paranthesis in the $__unixEpochGroupAlias macro => usage of *1000/$__interval_ms #Commit https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/46764
SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(height*30*1000/$__interval_ms+1598306400,$__interval),
  (EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400)) + EXTRACT (SECOND FROM to_timestamp(visor_processing_reports.height*30+1598306400))/60) AS minutes
FROM visor_processing_reports
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(height*30+1598306400) and (status = 'ERROR')
ORDER BY 1
